column4: I need a graphical tool for recovering lost files.  Does anyone know any?
testdisk is the only one I know.. it's text based but it's still select and press enter instead of point and click
it's a windows networking thingy.. kind of like dns but for smb network, afaik
not really.. I think dns can be used instead..
well.. encryption is the only way that I know of
